short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle display of noisy activity notifications in issue & PR threads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser Extension to toggle display of noisy activity/notifications in issue & PR threads. Especially useful for when you're using project management tools like ZenHub which provide secondary means of metadata/activity.
